name: Cheat the Magic Exam
description:
Jeepers! It's the day of the Magic Exam and none of you studied! You can't remember a single Spell... gonna have to rely on cheat sheets!

Use caution and strategy to get the most out of what you have to beat all three enemies! Each Party Member can only hold one Spell at a time, and can only cast that Spell once, so make it count!

All art, music, and code done by me. Font is "8 Bit Operator Plus 8". Made for the GMTK 2019 Game Jam!
